item.title: Robert Diab
item.description: I am an associate professor in the Faculty of Law at Thompson Rivers University in Kamloops, British Columbia. I write about criminal law, civil liberties, and human rights. A full list of publications is here. Recent research and writing can be found below. My summaries of criminal law can be found here. Find me on Twitter @robertdiab, or email me at rdiab [at] tru.ca
